name: ionizer
description: rebuild native node modules against the electron runtime

scripts.preversion: git checkout master && git pull && npm ls
scripts.publish-patch: npm run preversion && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --verbose
scripts.publish-minor: npm run preversion && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --verbose
scripts.publish-major: npm run preversion && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --verbose
